Class Balloon

  • java.lang.Object
    • Balloon

  • public class Balloon
extends java.lang.Object
    A Balloon to which we can add air. A Balloon has an amount and capacity. Amount is at most capacity and at least 0. A Balloon is popped if we add air that is beyond the capacity. We can add air to the balloon only if it is not popped.
